subject: Travel
title: The Taj Mahal: A Love Story in Marble
description: One-minute skill: The Taj Mahal: A Love Story in Marble.

hook.text: In 1631, Mughal Emperor Shah Jahan's wife died giving birth to their 14th child.

buildup.text: Consumed by grief, he ordered a tomb built from white marble that would be without equal.

discovery.text: Over 20,000 workers spent 22 years building it. Precious stones were inlaid from across Asia.

twist.text: Shah Jahan was later imprisoned by his own son. He could only see the Taj from his cell.

climax.text: When he died, he was buried beside his wife inside the monument he built for her.

punchline.text: The world's greatest monument is a love letter.

quiz.question: How long did it take to build the Taj Mahal?
